---
title: JodaTimeConverterManager
summary: Joda-Time's ConverterManager makes the semantics of DateTime/Instant/etc
  construction subject to global static state. If you need to define your own converters,
  use a helper.
layout: bugpattern
tags: ''
severity: WARNING
---

## Suppression
